titles: The theater of fine deuices containing an hundred morall emblemes. First penned in French by Guillaume de la Perriere, and translated into English by Thomas Combe.
author: La Perrière, Guillaume de, 1499-1565.
Combe, Thomas, fl. 1593-1614.
notes: A translation of: La theatre des bons engins.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
keywords: Emblem books, English --  Early works to 1800.
